column9: I like it.  With hx of substance abuse I don't feel high or done anything unusual.  The bottle causes anxiety because I can't tell how much is left.

column9: It is very goos product. No need to swallow pill. very fast acting.

column2: 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Patient)
column9: The best product in the market for insomnia

column2: 55-64 Male  on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Patient)
column9: Although it has a bitter cherry taste, it has a faster onset than Ambien or Temazapam. Additionally, have used in middle of night.

column2: RollTide14, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: Bottle is very hard to open, but understandable. The taste, however, is the most bitter, disgustingly strong taste I have ever experienced! I need a glass of water or something to chase the spray down with to prevent gagging. If the medicine weren't so much more effective than pills, the taste would definitely ruin it for me!

column2: 45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: Safety bottle is a little odd but i understand the need for it.  The product felt like i was taking anesthesia, i was out before i realized it so prepare yourself to go right to sleep immediately.  like others are saying...i had a very happy moment but it was not intolerable just funny effect

column2: Doc, 35-44 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I tried Zolpimist following a flight from LA to Vienna. I started to get sleepy much faster than with Ambien (I was actually still Skyping with my kids when I started to make no sense at all). It worked well and I will use again.

column2: 35-44 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: This is an spray version of the pill. The taste is ok.  However, being a spray must make this work a whole lot faster than the pill. My eyes seemed to get heavy within a couple minutes. And like the other reviewer, it put me in a very good mood like a light beer buzz or something

column2: 55-64 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I fell aspleep so fast i didn't have time to take my glasses off....wow..really works...please note had about 5 minute period of giddiness as a side effect
